mapper.select: select count(*) from tr natural join User
select tr_title,tr_content,tr_time,user_nickname,user_idx,tr_idx from tr natural join User where tr_idx=#{tr_idx}
mapper.update: update trComment set tr_comment_content=#{tr_comment_content} where tr_comment_idx=#{tr_comment_idx}
update trComment set tr_comment_useable=0 where tr_comment_idx=#{tr_comment_idx}
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(max(tr_comment_idx)+1,1) as tr_parent_idx from trComment
insert into trComment (tr_idx,tr_parent_idx,user_idx,tr_comment_content,tr_comment_useable) values (#{tr_idx},#{tr_parent_idx},#{user_idx},#{tr_comment_content},1)
